document.full_text: a film about a woman taking a stand against men in a north african village won cheers in cannes saturday, with some viewers moved by its expression of the spirit of the "arab spring" uprisings.
document.title: popular cannes film reflects "arab spring" spirit
lines_and_colors: a film about a woman taking a stand against men in a north african village won cheers in cannes saturday, with some viewers moved by its expression of the spirit of the "arab spring" uprisings.
